intro: Cybianthus nitidus, commonly known as the smooth cybianthus, is a flowering plant native to the western United States. It is a member of the Asteraceae family, characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant typically grows in dry, rocky habitats and is known for its showy yellow flowers. It has narrow, linear leaves that are often covered in a fine, powdery coating. Cybianthus nitidus is adapted to arid environments and is often found in mountainous regions.
